    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Listens to a port of this Server if there are any Clients that would like to connect. For every new socket connection a new ClientHandler thread is started that takes care of the further communication with the Client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • isUsernameInUse

        public boolean isUsernameInUse(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if there is already someone with that username logged in to the server
        Parameters:
        username -
        Returns:
        true if username is in use

      • isInGame

        public boolean isInGame(Player player)
        Checks if the player already is in a game
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:
        true if player is in the game

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(java.lang.String msg)
        Sends a message using the collection of connected ClientHandlers to all connected Clients.
        Parameters:
        msg - message that is sent

      • getFreeGame

        public Game getFreeGame()
        Returns a free game if there is one available. If not it returns a new Game;
        Returns:
